divs: Sighting DetailsI was Home in the Kichen eating at the table in the dark, starring out the open window toward Denver, which is over 250 miles away, 07-04-12 at 2:50am The morning was absolute clear and quiet. I am always seeing lights on the Jets flying over at night. Thought it was a white light on the wing of a Jet... Wham! a flash, wham, it grew 500 times the size. I thought the Jet blew up. I reported the event to a on line news paper, told them i saw a Jet explode over Denver. Nope, nothing on the news this morning? 07-04-12 Then i sat and recalled what i felt and saw at the time. (maybe) I know now i saw a intellegence of some kind, with thought transference ability, white, pure, glowing, gentle, smiling. It was small at first and i could just about see it. It turned sharply to me and grew very larg, and starred at me, it read my mind... it knew i was watching, then i felt drained, then i felt ok Then the entity turned West, went North leaving a tail of white Wallace Hill Lamar Colorado
